channel.title: A working GetTextAtEx script
channel.description:
If anyone can whip up a quick script to use the GetTextAtEx function, please post it here
You can make it for firefox or another common program
Just want to see it working

item.title: A working GetTextAtEx script
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[code]{include SRL\SRL.scar}

function GetTehSkilz(skill: string): Integer;
var // by RSN
T: TPoint;
TmpResult: string;
i: Integer;
begin
GameTab(2);
t:=skilltocoords(skill);
tmpResult := GetTextAtEx(T.x, T.y, 100, StatChars, False, True, 0, 5, -1, 2,
True, tr_Digits);
if (Trim(tmpResult) = ‘’) then
for i := 1 to 5 do
begin
tmpResult := GetTextAtEx(T.x + i, T.y, 100, StatChars, False, True, 0, 5,
-1, 2, True, tr_Digits);
if (Trim(tmpResult) <> ‘’) then
Exit;
end;
if (not (Trim(tmpResult) = ‘’)) then
Result := StrToInt(Trim(tmpResult));
end;

begin
Writeln(IntToStr(GetTehSkilz(‘hp’)));
end.[/code]

Have rs open on stat page. SHOULD Work.

Read full topic
